reviews.review:

Valve: *New update*
Me: "Daddy, why is so much shit on my face?"
Dad: "Stop fckn trash talking, bet а hundred on Navi"

Personally I love the game and believe in its potential but it has its flaws like any other game. After 2000 hours I had my share of fun, and rage from catching weird bugs and weapon breaking updates to cheaters who would either just straight kill you through walls and smokes or trynna hide it. Although the game has an enormous issue with cheaters, it can be fun, specially if you find a group of friends to play. Overall I believe the game has enormous potential but needs some fixes in certain things.
buy prime if you don't want to play vs cheaters non prime is bad tho
